wobani.rendering.stage

Class PostProcessingRenderingStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.rendering.stage.PostProcessingRenderingStage

  • public class PostProcessingRenderingStage
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int draw
      The index of the post processing FBO's color attachment where you should render to.
      private int notDraw
      The index of the post processing FBO's color attachment where you shouldn't render to.
      private Fbo postProcessingFbo
      FBO for resolving the multisampled textures and performing ping-pong rendering in the screen space stage.
      private java.util.List<PostProcessingRenderer> postProcessingRenderers
      List of screenspace renderers.

    • Field Detail

      • postProcessingFbo

        private Fbo postProcessingFbo
        FBO for resolving the multisampled textures and performing ping-pong rendering in the screen space stage.

      • postProcessingRenderers

        private final java.util.List<PostProcessingRenderer> postProcessingRenderers
        List of screenspace renderers. You may add to this list renderers like tone mapping, FXAA or UI renderers.

      • notDraw

        private int notDraw
        The index of the post processing FBO's color attachment where you shouldn't render to.

      • draw

        private int draw
        The index of the post processing FBO's color attachment where you should render to.

      • PostProcessingRenderingStage

        public PostProcessingRenderingStage()

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        private void refresh()
        Refreshes the FBOs if the MSAA level or the rendering size changed and the screen renderer if released.

      • bindFbo

        public void bindFbo()
        Binds the pipelin's FBO for rendering.

      • swapFboAttachments

        private void swapFboAttachments()
        Swaps the FBO's color attachments' index where render what you want in the Screen Space Stage. It's similar to double buffering.

        public boolean addRendererToTheEnd(@NotNull
                                   PostProcessingRenderer renderer)

        public void removeRenderer(int index)

        Parameters:
